keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledge to continue fighting for local jobs and industry including infrastructure for employers like BAE Systems and Leyland Trucks.
Focused on improving local transportation by maintaining bus links between New Longton and Longton.
Worked with agencies such as Environment Agency, United Utilities, and local authorities to address flooding issues in the constituency.
Lobbied the government to secure jobs of Joint Strike Fighter aircraft staff at BAE Systems Warton and Samlesbury and in the supply industries.

issues.economy: Stance on protecting the economy from the World recession impact and against cutting spending too deeply too soon.
issues.education: Pledge to fight for maintaining high quality education in local schools.
issues.environment: Working on combating local flooding issues with different organizations.
issues.health: Pledge to fight to maintain funding for the Health Service.
issues.socialWelfare: Helping local families by working on over 2,000 individual cases for people in South Ribble.

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been my privilege to represent you for 13 years. I know how important it is to listen to local people and their concerns.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on over 2,000 individual cases for people in South Ribble. Engaged with local authorities and organisations on issues like transportation and flooding.

quotes.text: I didn't know where to turn. Thanks to David's help I am now able to look after my family and can finally plan for the future.
Through David's hard work and persistence, I am now paying off my debts at a manageable amount each month, putting me in a much more secure financial position.
